person.persName: Berryman "Berry" Smith (Grant County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier.)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Elvira Hicks Smith in Gallatin County, Kentucky, on November 28, 1850. Father of James W. Smith, Mary E. Smith, Atha Smith, Charles Smith, Lucy J. Smith, and Eulies Smith. Laborer in Grant County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Grant County in 1860. Served in the 10th Indiana Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from March 2, 1864, to January 4, 1865. Died in Lawrence County, Alabama, on January 4, 1865.
